title: How to Download and Install Themes on the PSP

steps.headline: Select theme then click download.
steps.description: Save it in a place where you can find it easily.

steps.headline: Use the cable to connect the PSP to the computer and connect it.
Go to the file PSP and make a new folder with the name "THEME".
Paste the .ptf file in the theme folder.

methods.name: To download from the PSP browser:

steps.headline: Go to the same website given above.
It will be saved automatically on the theme file.

text: To download from PC: Open a web browser.  Go to www.psp-themes.net.  Select theme then click download. Save it in a place where you can find it easily. Use the cable to connect the PSP to the computer and connect it.  Go to the file PSP and make a new folder with the name "THEME".  Paste the .ptf file in the theme folder.  Open it in the PSP.  To download from the PSP browser: Go to the same website given above.  Choose the theme.  Press ""download theme"".  It will be saved automatically on the theme file.
